CHAT.comment: CHI and MIT are in the living room, playing with picture cards .

u.a: picks a card with a picture of Santa Claus on it
points in the direction of his parents bedroom
points in the direction of the apartment entrance
shows the card to CHI and points at Santa Claus
shows CHI a card with a picture of a bear on it
takes the card and puts it on the floor
takes another card out of the box and puts it on the floor
shows a picture of a saucepan
MIT points to kitchen, then to picture
shows CHI a picture of a chicken
gives MIT a picture of a basketball
moves his hand as if he is bouncing a basketball
gives MIT a picture of icecream
gives MIT a picture of a fish
looks at a picture of a car
takes a card with the letters T, U and V
takes a card with a picture of a bear on it
takes a card with a picture of eggs on it and puts it on the floor
picks up the egg card and shows it to CHI
takes a card with a picture of a duck on it
sorts the cards on the floor
shows a picture of a mouse
points at a card with a circle on it
takes the card and shows it to CHI
takes a card with a picture of pizza on it
points at the floor in front of the sofa
points to the kitchen, where his mother is cooking
finger pointing at the other corner of the room
finger pointing in the direction of his parents' bedroom
looks at a picture of a cow
points at the picture of pizza
looking at a picture of a nurse and of an owl
gives the two cards to MIT
points at the picture of a nurse
points at the picture of an owl
gives MIT a card with the letters M, N, O and P on it
the taperecorder has been making strange noise
looks at a toy train on the table
<bef> the train drops on the floor
moves the train in the air
moves the toy train on the table
takes a card with a picture of a lion on it
puts the train on the floor
puts the card on the floor
shows CHI a picture of a robot
shows CHI a picture of a penguin
gives MIT a card with a picture of man skiing on it
sorts the cards on the floor
shows CHI a picture of a kite
takes the box for the cards
puts the cards into the box
CHI is trying to close the box the wrong way
shows CHI how to close the box
reaches for the cards that were left on the table
shows CHI a picture of a lemon
points at the tape recorder and moves his hands in circles
picks a magazine on the table
points at a sticker sheet inserted in the magazine
all the stickers are used and there are none left of the sheet
points at a picture of a Chrismas tree
points at a slice of lemon on a glass of juice
points at the glass of juice and then his face
holds his hand in front of his face as if drinking with a straw
points at a sticker of sandwich in the picture
shows CHI a photograph of a dog
stands up and walks by MIT
picks up the card with a lemon on it .
opens the drawer of the table, pulls out some scrap paper, and then closes the drawer
pulls out a folded sheet of paper
looking at a train he colored
moves his arm like a driving rod
picks up a card from the floor
pulls out a sheet of paper from the drawer and points at a drawing of Baikinman on it
points at a drawing of Anpanman
puts the paper back in the drawer
takes out all the remaining paper in the drawer
points at the crayon scribble inside the drawer
clears the table top where CHI is standing with the chair
first syllable low tone, second high
taps the seat of the chair
sits on another chair, opposite from MIT
picks up the paper with the Anpanman drawing and shows it to CHI
points at the Flintstones coloring sheet on the floor
looks at a drawing of Anpanman next to Fred Flintstone
points at a drawing of Baikin man on the other corner of the sheet
takes out a crayon from a can and scribbles on a sheet of paper
shakes his head while looking at MIT's drawing
touches the Baikinman mask he is wearing
looks at the coloring sheet on the floor
points at the drawing of Anpanman on the coloring sheet .
points at the drawing of Baikin man
picks up a card with a picture of some cartoon character on it
the Baikinman mask comes off his head
puts the Baikinman mask on CHI's head
flicks his wrist over his head
takes a rolled up cardboard with Baikinman and Anpanman printed on it
points at the unknown character on the card
throws away the rolled up Baikinman/Anpanman
points at the drawing of Anpanman on the table
points at the Anpanman on the floor
points at the Anpanman on the table
points at the Anapnman on the table again
points at the Anpanman on the floor
picks up the Anpanman on the floor
points at the Anpanman on the table
points at a piece of cardboard and at the toy cabinet
Sorao = a child TV show character
shows FAT and MOT the unknown character he saw before
the one he has in his hand does not fit the description
apparently there's another piece that goes with this one and has the Sorao character on it .
stops MIT from flipping the pages
Mido and Fado are TV characters
sees Mido and Fado in the magazine
there are many trains (Thomas and friends) on the page
points at a character called Resshii
The song Musunde Hiraite on the page, with gestures
moves his hands like driving rods
points at a picture showing clapping hands and then moves his hands like two driving rods
Goodon= Gordon, a character from 'Thomas the tank engine'
points at a toy train on the floor
holds out the toy train to CHI
points at a picture of food in the magazine
lifts a flap on the page
turns around and bangs the toy train on the table
<bef> lifts another flap . underneath is a picture of Japanese noodles
points at a picture of a physician
points at the stethoscope the doctor is using to listen to his patient's chest and taps his own chest
points at a woman standing behind the patient boy
folds the page in the middle
the page can be folded to play 'inaiinaibaa'
points at a character called Dokin-chan
moves his finger along the road .
